fullText: This musical about cheerleaders who withhold sex until their basketball team starts winning is surprisingly sweet and funny, with a terrific cast led by Patti Murin.
dtliExcerpt: This musical about cheerleaders who withhold sex until their basketball team starts winning is surprisingly sweet and funny, with a terrific cast led by Patti Murin.
